metadata.title: CVE-2014-3966 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Special:PasswordReset inMediaWiki before 1.19.16, 1.21.x before 1.21.10, and 1.22.x before 1.22.7,when wgRawHtml is enabled, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via an invalid username.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3966` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.16+dfsg-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.16+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.16+dfsg-1').
